alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 13 at 9:49AM CDT until April 15 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River at Chewey affecting Adair, Cherokee and Delaware Counties. Flint Creek near Kansas affecting Cherokee and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Illinois River at Chewey. * WHEN...From this morning to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, no flooding occurs but all recreational floating along the Illinois River ceases due to strong turbulence. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
